snippet: The Carolina Panthers will be without starting defensive tackle Star Lotulelei for Saturday’s N.F.C. divisional playoff game against Seattle after undergoing surgery Wednesday to repair a broken bone in his foot.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Carolina Panthers will be without starting defensive tackle Star Lotulelei for their NFC divisional-round playoff game against Seattle Seahawks following his surgery to repair broken foot bone; other football news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and TOM PEDULLA

lead_paragraph: The Carolina Panthers will be without starting defensive tackle Star Lotulelei for Saturday’s N.F.C. divisional playoff game against Seattle after undergoing surgery Wednesday to repair a broken bone in his foot.

headline.print_headline: Panthers Lineman to Miss Game Against Seahawks
headline.main: Panthers Lineman to Miss Game Against Seahawks
